title: Wukong's Monkey Stick Bopping Hotline
body:
Hello there :D, I hope you all have a fantastic day.

I humbly invite you to watch me unranked to diamond starting Sunday at 9:00 AM PST January 10nth twitch.tv/findingrito . Regular hours are provided on stream.

I mostly main monkey but I will take other champion requests. I have been playing since the first year of league's public release. This preseason I have attained diamond 2

Within this stream you will be able to request songs, receive live game commentary and I will help answer questions.

Things this stream will help provide for you:
Item builds and champion power spikes.
Knowing when to rotate and roam.
match ups
Team compositions
When you should be aggressive/ passive
How to be positive with teammates in game.

Thank you for your time, I hope you all have a wonderful time in solo que

Twitch.tv/findingrito
